oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Portrait of Lt. E. M. Ayers
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Framed full-length color portrait of Lt. E. M. Ayers [Ayres] in Confederate officer's uniform. The small lithograph shows Ayers drawing his sword. He wears a plumed hat with cap device pinned on side. Ayers was born in Arkansas in 1840 and was the son of John B. and Mary Marshall Moseley Ayers. (Family also spells its name Ayres.) Edmond Ayers married Sallie J. Bowen in Osceola, Ark.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Tennessee State Library and Archives, Nashville, Davidson County, Tennessee
